name: profile-card
title: Profile Card
description: Profile card with the user's avatar, name, badges, recent activity, and teams.

files.content:
import { Avatar, AvatarFallback, AvatarImage } from "@/components/ui/avatar" import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import { Card, CardContent, CardFooter, CardHeader } from "@/components/ui/card" import { Code, GitBranch, Mail, Users } from 'lucide-react' interface ProfileCardProps { name: string role: string avatarUrl: string skills: string[] recentActivity: string team: string email: string } export function ProfileCard({ name, role, avatarUrl, skills, recentActivity, team, email }: ProfileCardProps) { return ( {name.split(' ').map(n => n[0]).join('')}

{name}

{role}
{skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
Recent activity: {recentActivity}
Team: {team}
) }
